original_text: If a leader is really guilty and continues to do wrong things, you must warn him. Do that when everyone in the church is there. They will hear what you say, and they will be afraid to do wrong things themselves.
korean_text: 범죄한 자들을 모든 사람 앞에서 꾸짖어 나머지 사람들로 두려워하게 하라

sentences.original_text: If a leader is really guilty
and continues to do wrong things
Do that when everyone in the church is there
sentences.korean_translation: 교회에 있는 모든 사람이 있을 때 그렇게 하라

sentences.original_text: They will hear what you say
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네가 말하는 것을 들을 것이다
